languages.text:
The Raven retargets any non-attacking, single-target Psyker ability the Overseer uses on it to other targets in a big area around it. Targets are chosen correspondingly: if an ability affects allies, only allies will be affected; if enemies — only enemies. Only Psyker abilities can be retargeted via the Relaying Psyber-Raven.
All retargeted abilities refer to the Raven’s stats in their calculations (except Psy Rating). Abilities that affect bonus turns can't be retargeted.
In this state, the Psyber-Raven is considered a low-priority target for enemies. All enemies in Relaying area are considered {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}Scried{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
The Raven retargets any non-attacking, single-target Psyker ability the Overseer uses on it to other targets in a big area around it. Targets are chosen correspondingly: if an ability affects allies, only allies will be affected; if enemies — only enemies. Only Psyker abilities can be retargeted via the Relaying Psyber-Raven.
All retargeted abilities refer to the Raven’s stats in their calculations (except Psy Rating). Abilities that affect bonus turns can't be retargeted.
In this state, the Psyber-Raven is considered a low-priority target for enemies. All enemies in Relaying area are considered {g|f:a115669547864ccc816f0598a404e816}Scried{/g}.

languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзиратель{/g} применяет неатакующую {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}психосилу{/g} для одиночной цели к этому псайберворону, эта психосила применяется ко всем подходящим целям (союзникам или противникам) в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, но на самого фамильяра не действует. Эффект от таких психосил рассчитывается с учетом {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} псайберворона (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинга{/g}). Этот псайберворон является наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для врагов.

traits.locale_text:
Whenever the Overseer uses a non-attacking single-target psychic power upon this psyber-raven, the psyber-raven remains unaffected by it but channels it towards all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a big radius. The effects of channelled psychic powers are calculated using the psyber-raven's characteristics (except psy rating).
This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest priority target.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bu ruhsiber kuzgun üzerinde saldırı dışı tek hedefli {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}ruhsezi güçlerini{/g} kullandığında bu güçler, anında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan ilişkili tüm hedeflere (dost veya düşman birim) uygulanır. Ruhsiber kuzgunda ise herhangi bir etkileri olmaz. Bu ruhsezi güçlerinin etkisi, ruhsiber kuzgunun {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}ruhsezi derecesi{/g} hariç) kullanılarak hesaplanır. Bu ruhsiber kuzgun, düşmanların en düşük {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} olarak kabul edilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gözetmen, bu ruhsiber kuzgun üzerinde saldırı dışı tek hedefli ruhsezi güçlerini kullandığında bu güçler, anında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan ilişkili tüm hedeflere (dost veya düşman birim) uygulanır. Ruhsiber kuzgunda ise herhangi bir etkileri olmaz. Bu ruhsezi güçlerinin etkisi, ruhsiber kuzgunun nitelikleri (ruhsezi derecesi hariç) kullanılarak hesaplanır. Bu ruhsiber kuzgun, düşmanların en düşük öncelikli hedefi olarak kabul edilir.

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}, bu ruhsiber kuzgun üzerinde saldırı dışı tek hedefli ruhsezi güçlerini kullandığında bu güçler, anında ruhsiber kuzgunun etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan ilişkili tüm hedeflere (dost veya düşman birim) uygulanır. Ruhsiber kuzgunda ise herhangi bir etkileri olmaz. Bu ruhsezi güçlerinin etkisi, ruhsiber kuzgunun {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}nitelikleri{/g} (ruhsezi derecesi hariç) kullanılarak hesaplanır. Bu ruhsiber kuzgun, düşmanların en düşük öncelikli hedefi olarak kabul edilir.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} utiliza {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} no ofensivos de un solo objetivo sobre su psicocuervo, aplica su efecto inmediatamente a todos los objetivos relevantes (aliados o enemigos) que haya en un radio de 4 casillas a su alrededor, sin afectar al propio psicocuervo. El efecto de estos poderes psíquicos se calcula usando las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} del psicocuervo (excepto el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}). Este psicocuervo se considera el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de menor importancia de los enemigos.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el supervisor utiliza poderes psíquicos no ofensivos de un solo objetivo sobre su psicocuervo, aplica su efecto inmediatamente a todos los objetivos relevantes (aliados o enemigos) que haya en un radio de 4 casillas a su alrededor, sin afectar al propio psicocuervo. El efecto de estos poderes psíquicos se calcula usando las características del psicocuervo (excepto el factor psíquico). Este psicocuervo se considera el objetivo menos prioritario de los enemigos.

Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g} utiliza {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}poderes psíquicos{/g} no ofensivos de un solo objetivo sobre su psicocuervo, aplica su efecto inmediatamente a todos los objetivos relevantes (aliados o enemigos) que haya en un radio de 4 casillas a su alrededor, sin afectar al propio psicocuervo. El efecto de estos poderes psíquicos se calcula usando las {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} del psicocuervo (excepto el {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}factor psíquico{/g}). Este psicocuervo se considera el objetivo menos prioritario de los enemigos.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}对这只生化渡鸦使用非攻击类的单体灵能能力时，该{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}灵能能力{/g}的效果会立刻施加在生化渡鸦4格内的所有相关目标身上（范围内盟友或敌人），但不会影响到生化渡鸦本身。该灵能能力的实际效果会根据生化渡鸦的{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}进行计算（{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}灵能等级{/g}除外）。 这只生化渡鸦是敌方攻击{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先度最低的目标{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当监察官对这只生化渡鸦使用非攻击类的单体灵能能力时，该灵能能力的效果会立刻施加在生化渡鸦4格内的所有相关目标身上（范围内盟友或敌人），但不会影响到生化渡鸦本身。该灵能能力的实际效果会根据生化渡鸦的属性进行计算（灵能等级除外）。 这只生化渡鸦是敌方攻击优先度最低的目标。

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufseher{/g} bei diesem Psitech-Raben {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psionische Kräfte{/g} anwendet, die kein Einzelziel angreifen, gelten sie sofort für alle relevanten Ziele (Verbündete oder Gegner) in einem Radius von 4 Zellen um den Psitech-Raben, haben auf ihn selbst aber keine Wirkung. Die Wirkung dieser psionischen Kräfte wird auf Basis der {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g} des Psitech-Raben (außer {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}Psi-Wert{/g}) berechnet. Der Psitech-Rabe gilt für Gegner als Ziel mit der geringsten {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Priorität{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Aufseher bei diesem Psitech-Raben psionische Kräfte anwendet, die kein Einzelziel angreifen, gelten sie sofort für alle relevanten Ziele (Verbündete oder Gegner) in einem Radius von 4 Zellen um den Psitech-Raben, haben auf ihn selbst aber keine Wirkung. Die Wirkung dieser psionischen Kräfte wird auf Basis der Eigenschaften des Psitech-Raben (außer Psi-Wert) berechnet. Der Psitech-Rabe gilt für Gegner als Ziel mit der geringsten Priorität.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g} utilise un {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}pouvoir psychique{/g} non offensif à cible unique sur sa psyber-corneille, l'effet est appliqué à toutes les cibles adéquates (alliées ou ennemies) dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, mais pas à la psyber-corneille elle-même. L'effet de ces pouvoirs psychiques est calculé selon les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de la psyber-corneille (à l'exception de l'{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}indice psy{/g}). Cette psyber-corneille est considérée comme la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible la moins prioritaire{/g} par les ennemis.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que le surveillant utilise un pouvoir psychique non offensif à cible unique sur sa psyber-corneille, l'effet est appliqué à toutes les cibles adéquates (alliées ou ennemies) dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de la psyber-corneille, mais pas à la psyber-corneille elle-même. L'effet de ces pouvoirs psychiques est calculé selon les caractéristiques de la psyber-corneille (à l'exception de l'indice psy). Cette psyber-corneille est considérée comme la cible la moins prioritaire par les ennemis.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}がサイバーレイヴンに非攻撃の単体{g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}超能力{/g}を使用する場合、半径4セル以内のすべての対象ターゲット（味方または敵）に即座に適用され、サイバーレイヴン自体には影響はない。これらの超能力の効果はサイバーレイヴンの{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}を使用して計算する（{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}超能力レート{/g}は除く）。 このサイバーレイヴンは、敵の最も低い{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先度のターゲット{/g}と見なされる。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g} uses non-attacking single-target {g|Encyclopedia:PsykerPowersGlossary}psychic powers{/g} on this psyber-raven, they are immediately applied to all relevant targets (allies or enemies) in a 4-cell radius around it, having no effect on the psyber-raven itself. The effect of those psychic powers is calculated using the psyber-raven's {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} (except {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}psy rating{/g}). This psyber-raven is considered the enemies' lowest {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 監督者がサイバーレイヴンに非攻撃の単体超能力を使用する場合、半径4セル以内のすべての対象ターゲット（味方または敵）に即座に適用され、サイバーレイヴン自体には影響はない。これらの超能力の効果はサイバーレイヴンの特性を使用して計算する（超能力レートは除く）。 このサイバーレイヴンは、敵の最も低い優先度のターゲットと見なされる。
監督者がサイバーレイヴンに非攻撃の単体超能力を使用する場合、半径4セル以内のすべての対象ターゲット（味方または敵）に即座に適用され、サイバーレイヴン自体には影響はない。これらの超能力の効果はサイバーレイヴンの特性を使用して計算する（超能力レートは除く）。 このサイバーレイヴンは、敵の最も低い優先度のターゲットと見なされる。

Эффект от таких психосил рассчитывается с учетом {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристик{/g} псайберворона (кроме {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}пси-рейтинга{/g}). Этот псайберворон является наименее {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} для врагов.

traits.locale_text: Когда надзиратель применяет неатакующую психосилу для одиночной цели к этому псайберворону, эта психосила применяется ко всем подходящим целям (союзникам или противникам) в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, но на самого фамильяра не действует. Эффект от таких психосил рассчитывается с учетом характеристик псайберворона (кроме пси-рейтинга). Этот псайберворон является наименее приоритетной целью для врагов.

Когда надзиратель применяет неатакующую психосилу для одиночной цели к этому псайберворону, эта психосила применяется ко всем подходящим целям (союзникам или противникам) в радиусе 4 клеток от псайберворона, но на самого фамильяра не действует. Эффект от таких психосил рассчитывается с учетом характеристик псайберворона (кроме пси-рейтинга). Этот псайберворон является наименее приоритетной целью для врагов.
